item.title: MIUI OS1.0.6.0.UOGMIXM Fastboot update for Redmi Note 14 4G Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Note 14 4G Global

Codename: tanzanite

Version: OS1.0.6.0.UOGMIXM | 14.0

Size: 7.7 GB

MD5: 8f01943ae812f843f74207bf442bc38b

Changelog:
[Highlights]
Optimization: Frame drops and stuttering issues in Honor of Kings
[System]
Optimization: System stability
Updated the security patch to December 2024. Increased system security.
